LanguageData.GA.SocialFightTransphobia: {PAWN1_labelShort} started a social fight with {PAWN2_labelShort} because of {PAWN1_possessive} transphobic beliefs.
LanguageData.GA.FoundOutThroughChat: {RECEIVER_labelShort} was told by {TELLER_labelShort} that {GOSSIPED_labelShort} is transgender.
LanguageData.GA.VersionUpdate: URGENT FROM TOPIC OF GENDER! PLEASE READ
LanguageData.GA.VersionUpdateMain:
Hi! Sorry for the interruption, but Topic of Gender has gotten a big update since the last time you've played.

If this is a new save, carry on, otherwise please continue reading.

Topic of Gender has gotten a massive refactor which can affect the balance of your current saves.

One of these big chances are, people no longer know who is transgender unless they come out or are suspicious.

If you would like to know more, please go to the mod description for the full changelog.
